entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:31 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: W 24 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
